articles.author: Lauren Forristal
articles.title: Linear TV viewing sinks below 50% as streaming soars to new heights - TechCrunch
articles.description: In a first for linear TV viewing, cable and broadcast usage fell below 50% in terms of total share among U.S. viewers.
articles.content: In a first for linear TV viewing, cable and broadcast usage fell below 50% in terms of total share among U.S. viewers, according to Nielsens July 2023 report. Cable viewing dropped below 30% for the … [+2510 chars]
